name: Final Fright Deep Beneath (Demo)
description:
Final Fright Deep Beneath is an Indie Horror game that takes place on a space ship. Your goal is to survive as you repair the ship by following objectives. Avoid the horrors of 2 beasts as they roam the ship. Currently the demo is very linear with only 3 missions.

I take any and all feedback, please leave your feedback in the comments or you could make a video with feedback inside of it.
